amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 115-679 to prioritize grants for forest restoration under the Competitive Forestry, Natural Resources, and Environmental Grants Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 115-679 to prioritize grants for forest restoration under the Competitive Forestry, Natural Resources, and Environmental Grants Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A040) offered by Ms. Stefanik.
